UniprotID	Q7Z7J5
Accession	Q7Z7J5;Q8WVF0
EntryName	DPPA2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Developmental pluripotency-associated protein 2 (Pluripotent embryonic stem cell-related gene 1 protein)
GeneName	DPPA2 PESCRG1
Length	298
Function	Binds to target gene promoters, including NKX2-5 and SYCE1, but not GATA4, and may be involved in the maintenance of the active epigenetic status of these genes.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
